original_text: The plants beside the river will die, as well as the crops in the fields along the shore. Everything will become dry and the wind will blow it all away.
korean_text: 나일 가까운 곳 나일 언덕의 초장과 나일 강 가까운 곡식 밭이 다 말라서 날려가 없어질 것이며

sentences.original_text: The plants beside the river will die
as well as the crops in the fields
and the wind will blow it all away
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 바람이 모든 것을 날려 보낼 것입니다
